name: Space Guy: Arena
description:
A quick game i made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5. Game is a simple arcadey space flight game, where you try to avoid asteroids. You can upgrade your ship and the game has some cutscenes and a simple plot. Enjoy!

Updates:

1.01 

-Fixed a problem where the dialogue in the tutorial was shown incorrectly

1.02

-Changed spawn rates for small asteroids

-Increased money gained from green balls 50->200

-Moved lasers further away

-Added counter for seconds survived after death

-After death cutscenes can now be skipped with spacebar

-Fixed typo in store

1.03

-Spacebar can now be used to start the game

-Saving the game has a stronger indicator now
